name: Rare Vintage Leather Ecru Togo Sofa

condition.details: Wear consistent with age and use.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Beautiful vintage leather sofa completely in foam. Covered in Ecru white leather. Beautiful vintage condition with normal signs of wear. The design is similar to the Togo. Manufacturer is yet unknown. Comfortable seating. Unique design. from the 70s/80s.
specifications.rawSpecificationsText:
Beautiful vintage leather sofa completely in foam.
Covered in Ecru white leather. Beautiful vintage condition with normal signs of wear.
The design is similar to the Togo.
Manufacturer is yet unknown.
Comfortable seating.
Unique design.
from the 70s/80s.
